comprehensive_report:
# Comprehensive BaZi Analysis Report

**Gender**: Female | **Age**: 41 | **Birth Year**: 1985

---

## SECTION 1: CHART SETUP

### Four Pillars (四柱)

| | Year (年柱) | Month (月柱) | Day (日柱) | Hour (时柱) |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| **Palace** | Parents/Ancestry | Career/Social | Self/Spouse | Children/Legacy |
| **Heavenly Stem** | 乙 (Yi) Wood | 戊 (Wu) Earth | 戊 (Wu) Earth | 戊 (Wu) Earth |
| **Earthly Branch** | 丑 (Chou) Earth | 子 (Zi) Water | 戌 (Xu) Earth | 戌 (Xu) Earth |
| **Hidden Stems** | 己(75), 癸(25), 辛(10) | 癸(100) | 戊(75), 辛(25), 丁(10) | 戊(75), 辛(25), 丁(10) |

### Day Master (日主)

**戊 (Wu) — Earth Yang**

*Wu Earth = the great mountain. Solid, reliable, unmovable, patient to a fault.*

Personality: reliable, patient, stubborn, protective, slow-to-change

### Ten Gods Map (十神)

| Location | Stem | Ten God | Chinese |
|---|---|---|---|
| year_stem | 乙 (Yi) | Direct Officer (DO) | 正官 |
| year_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 己 (Ji) | Rob Wealth (RW) | 劫財 |
| year_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 癸 (Gui) | Direct Wealth (DW) | 正財 |
| year_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 辛 (Xin) | Hurting Officer (HO) | 傷官 |
| month_stem | 戊 (Wu) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| month_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 癸 (Gui) | Direct Wealth (DW) | 正財 |
| day_stem | 戊 (Wu) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| day_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 戊 (Wu) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| day_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 辛 (Xin) | Hurting Officer (HO) | 傷官 |
| day_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 丁 (Ding) | Direct Resource (DR) | 正印 |
| hour_stem | 戊 (Wu) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| hour_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 戊 (Wu) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| hour_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 辛 (Xin) | Hurting Officer (HO) | 傷官 |
| hour_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 丁 (Ding) | Direct Resource (DR) | 正印 |

---

## SECTION 2: DAY MASTER STRENGTH ASSESSMENT

**Score: 50.0/100** (50 = perfectly balanced)

- Support count: 5.45
- Drain count: 2.85
- Seasonal state: Trapped
- Verdict: **EXTREMELY STRONG**

*This Day Master has far too much fuel. Energy is excessive — needs heavy draining.*

### Useful God (用神): **Fire** (火)

- Favorable elements: Fire (火), Metal (金), Wood (木), Water (水)
- Unfavorable elements: Earth (土)

---

## SECTION 3: TEN GODS DEEP ANALYSIS (十神)

| Ten God | Chinese | Strength | Visible | Hidden | Locations |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Friend (F) | 比肩 | **PROMINENT** | 3 | 2 | month_stem, day_stem, day_branch_primary_qi, hour_stem, hour_branch_primary_qi |
| Rob Wealth (RW) | 劫財 | **HIDDEN_ONLY** | 0 | 1 | year_branch_primary_qi |
| Eating God (EG) | 食神 | **ABSENT** | 0 | 0 |  |
| Hurting Officer (HO) | 傷官 | **PRESENT** | 0 | 3 | year_branch_hidden_2, day_branch_hidden_1, hour_branch_hidden_1 |
| Indirect Wealth (IW) | 偏財 | **ABSENT** | 0 | 0 |  |
| Direct Wealth (DW) | 正財 | **PRESENT** | 0 | 2 | year_branch_hidden_1, month_branch_primary_qi |
| Seven Killings (7K) | 七殺 | **ABSENT** | 0 | 0 |  |
| Direct Officer (DO) | 正官 | **PRESENT** | 1 | 0 | year_stem |
| Indirect Resource (IR) | 偏印 | **ABSENT** | 0 | 0 |  |
| Direct Resource (DR) | 正印 | **PRESENT** | 0 | 2 | day_branch_hidden_2, hour_branch_hidden_2 |

**Friend (比肩)**: Prominent Friend means fierce independence and competition. Wealth is shared or fought over.

**Rob Wealth (劫財)**: Rob Wealth (劫財) is present — some financial leakage through competition.

**Eating God (食神)**: Eating God (食神) is absent — lacks natural creative expression and easy joy.

**Hurting Officer (傷官)**: Hurting Officer (傷官) is present — creative edge with some authority conflicts.

**Indirect Wealth (偏財)**: Indirect Wealth (偏財) is absent — windfall opportunities rare, must earn steadily.

**Direct Wealth (正財)**: Direct Wealth (正財) is present — stable finances and commitment capacity.

**Seven Killings (七殺)**: Seven Killings (七殺) is absent — less aggressive drive, fewer enemies.

**Direct Officer (正官)**: Direct Officer (正官) is present — reasonable discipline and career structure.

**Indirect Resource (偏印)**: Indirect Resource (偏印) is absent — more conventional thinking patterns.

**Direct Resource (正印)**: Direct Resource (正印) is present — reasonable educational and health foundation.

### Spouse Star: husband star (正官)

Status: PRESENT. Locations: year_stem

### Children Stars: HO / EG

### Notable Patterns

- **companion_heavy**: Too many companions (Friend + Rob Wealth) = competition problems, wealth leakage, relationship interference
- **output_heavy**: Too much output energy (EG + HO) = energy drain, overwork, weakened authority, undermined structure


---

## SECTION 4: BRANCH INTERACTIONS (地支关系)

### Six Harmonies (六合)

- **丑子合 → Earth**
  - Palaces: Year (Parents/Ancestry), Month (Career/Social)
  - Severity: mild

### Punishments (三刑)

- **丑未戌 无礼之刑 (PARTIAL) - Bullying/Rudeness Punishment**
  - Palaces: Year (Parents/Ancestry), Day (Self/Spouse), Hour (Children/Legacy)
  - Severity: moderate


---

## SECTION 5: SHEN SHA FULL AUDIT (神煞)

### Present Stars

| Star | Chinese | Location | Palace | Nature | Severity | Void? |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Heavenly Noble | 天乙贵人 | Chou | year | auspicious | mild |  |
| Canopy Star | 华盖 | Chou | year | mixed | mild |  |
| Canopy Star | 华盖 | Xu | day | mixed | mild |  |
| Canopy Star | 华盖 | Xu | hour | mixed | mild |  |
| Heaven's Net | 天罗 | Xu | day | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Heaven's Net | 天罗 | Xu | day | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Widow Star | 寡宿 | Xu | day | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Ten Evils Great Defeat | 十恶大败 |  |  | inauspicious | severe |  |
| Kui Gang | 魁罡 |  |  | mixed | moderate |  |
| Strangle Star | 绞 | Zi | month | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Salty Pool | 咸池 | Zi | month | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Wealth Star | 財星 | Zi | month | auspicious | mild |  |

### Derivation Details

- **天乙贵人 (Heavenly Noble)**: For Wu DM: Tian Yi at 丑 (Chou). Found in year palace.
  - *Heavenly Noble — powerful protector. In trouble, help always comes from unexpected sources.*
- **华盖 (Canopy Star)**: For year branch 丑: Hua Gai at 丑. In year.
  - *Hua Gai present = the hermit's star. Deep thinker, but lonely unless embraced.*
- **华盖 (Canopy Star)**: For day branch 戌: Hua Gai at 戌. In day.
  - *Canopy Star — solitary, spiritual, intellectual. Prefers isolation over crowds.*
- **华盖 (Canopy Star)**: For day branch 戌: Hua Gai at 戌. In hour.
  - *Canopy Star — solitary, spiritual, intellectual. Prefers isolation over crowds.*
- **天罗 (Heaven's Net)**: 戌 in day palace = Heaven's Net (天罗).
  - *Heaven's Net — feeling trapped, especially in legal or relationship matters.*
- **天罗 (Heaven's Net)**: 戌 in day palace = Heaven's Net (天罗).
  - *Heaven's Net — feeling trapped, especially in legal or relationship matters.*
- **寡宿 (Widow Star)**: For 丑 year: Gua Su at 戌. PRESENT.
  - *Widow Star — loneliness in relationships, especially for females.*
- **十恶大败 (Ten Evils Great Defeat)**: Day Pillar 戊戌: IS a Ten Evils day.
  - *Ten Evils Great Defeat — historical marker for extreme misfortune with wealth.*
- **魁罡 (Kui Gang)**: Day Pillar 戊戌: IS a Kui Gang day.
  - *Kui Gang — powerful, commanding, but hard on relationships and self.*
- **绞 (Strangle Star)**: Year 丑: Strangle at 子. PRESENT.
  - *Strangle Star — suffocating situations, trapped in conflicts.*
- **咸池 (Salty Pool)**: For Wu DM: Xian Chi at 子. PRESENT.
  - *Salty Pool — sexual excess, addiction tendencies, loss through pleasure.*
- **財星 (Wealth Star)**: For Wu DM (Earth): wealth=Water. 子 (Zi) carries Water qi. Found in month.
  - *Wealth Star — small fortune energy. Wealth element naturally present, money comes with less friction.*

### Notable Absences

- **天乙贵人 (Heavenly Noble)**: No Heavenly Noble = less natural protection. Must build own safety nets.
- **天德贵人 (Heavenly Virtue)**: No Heavenly Virtue. Misfortunes hit at full force.
- **文昌贵人 (Academic Star)**: No Academic Star. Education success requires more effort.
- **禄神 (Prosperity Star)**: No Prosperity Star = wealth must be actively fought for.
- **将星 (General Star)**: No General Star = must build authority from scratch.
- **天医 (Heavenly Doctor)**: No Heavenly Doctor = health needs more active management.
- **红鸾 (Red Phoenix)**: No Red Phoenix = romance comes later or with less intensity.


---

## SECTION 6: RED FLAGS — DIRECT AND UNFILTERED

### Marriage & Relationships (7 indicators)

- **[MODERATE] companion_heavy** (ten_god): Too many companions (Friend + Rob Wealth) = competition problems, wealth leakage, relationship interference
- **[MODERATE] 半刑** (branch_interaction): 丑未戌 无礼之刑 (PARTIAL) - Bullying/Rudeness Punishment
- **[MODERATE] 半刑** (branch_interaction): 丑未戌 无礼之刑 (PARTIAL) - Bullying/Rudeness Punishment

---

## SECTION 7: CURRENT LUCK PILLAR ANALYSIS (大运)

---

## SECTION 8: HEALTH ANALYSIS (健康)

### Element Balance

| Element | Count | Status | Organs at Risk |
|---|---|---|---|
| Wood (木) | 1.0 | Balanced | — |
| Fire (火) | 0.2 | DEFICIENT | poor circulation, cold extremities, depression, low energy |
| Earth (土) | 5.2 | EXCESS | overthinking, bloating, weight gain, obsessive worry |
| Metal (金) | 0.6 | DEFICIENT | weak immune system, asthma, dry skin, frequent colds |
| Water (水) | 1.2 | Balanced | — |

### Organ Systems at Risk

- **Fire DEFICIENT**: Heart (心) and Small Intestine (小肠) weakened. Watch for: poor circulation, cold extremities, depression, low energy. Body parts affected: tongue, blood vessels, complexion.
- **Earth EXCESS**: Spleen (脾) and Stomach (胃) overloaded. Watch for: overthinking, bloating, weight gain, obsessive worry. Body parts affected: mouth, muscles, flesh.
- **Metal DEFICIENT**: Lungs (肺) and Large Intestine (大肠) weakened. Watch for: weak immune system, asthma, dry skin, frequent colds. Body parts affected: nose, skin, body hair.


---

## SECTION 9: REMEDIES & WHAT MUST CHANGE

### 9a. Elemental Remedies

**Useful God Element: Fire (火)**

- **Colors to wear**: red, orange, purple, pink
- **Colors to avoid**: black, dark blue
- **Favorable directions**: South, West, Northwest, East, Southeast, North
- **Industries**: technology, media, entertainment, energy, restaurant
- **Environment**: bright lighting, candles, south-facing windows

### 9b. Behavioral Changes

- Channel excess energy into productive output (creative work, exercise).
- Practice patience and listening. Your strength can bulldoze others.
- Give more than you take. Generosity balances your chart.

### 9c. Relationship Guidance

- Best partner element alignment: Water (水)
- Your spouse palace (Day Branch): 戌 (Xu)

### 9d. Financial Strategy

- Wealth element (Water) can be handled. Take calculated risks in favorable years.

### 9e. Relocation & Environment

- Crossing Water benefit: **MODERATE** (score: 2/5)
  - Water is a favorable element for this chart
  - Water element below average (count: 1.2)
  - Fire+Earth dominance (0.2+5.2) needs Water to balance
- Ideal climate: hot, tropical, sunny climate
- Ideal geography: tropical regions, elevated or volcanic areas

**This chart moderately benefits from crossing water. Living near water or abroad will significantly help.**


---

---

## SECTION 11: HONEST SUMMARY

### Core Life Lesson

*You have abundant energy but it needs direction. Your lesson is channeling power into productive outlets rather than letting it stagnate.*

### Designed For vs. Fighting Against

This chart is designed to thrive with **Fire** energy — technology type environments.

The biggest fight is against excessive **Earth** energy, which stagnates this chart.

### The Single Most Important Thing

**Balance is everything.** Your chart has real strengths but also real vulnerabilities. The useful god (Fire) must be consistently present in your environment, career, and relationships. When it is, everything flows. When it isn't, problems compound.

items.label: Liver (肝) (Wood)
items.value: Wood below average (12%). Mild liver vulnerability. Body parts: eyes, tendons, nails.

items.label: Heart (心) (Fire)
items.value: Fire severely deficient (2%). poor circulation, cold extremities, depression, low energy. Fire in Dead (死) seasonal state — heightened heart vulnerability. Body parts: tongue, blood vessels, complexion.

items.label: Spleen (脾) (Earth)
items.value: Earth in excess (63%). overthinking, bloating, weight gain, obsessive worry. Earth in Trapped (囚) seasonal state — heightened spleen vulnerability. Body parts: mouth, muscles, flesh.

items.label: Lungs (肺) (Metal)
items.value: Metal severely deficient (7%). weak immune system, asthma, dry skin, frequent colds. Fire controls Metal. Weak Fire means respiratory system (Lungs) and immune response are unregulated. Body parts: nose, skin, body hair.

items.label: Kidneys (肾) (Water)
items.value: Earth controls Water. Weak Earth means urinary/reproductive system (Kidneys) can become unregulated. Body parts: ears, bones, reproductive system.

sections.title: Honest Summary
sections.text: You are Wu Earth (戊土). Personality: reliable, patient, stubborn, protective, slow-to-change. Your Day Master is extremely strong (50% element presence, 20% = balanced). You have overwhelming energy. The risk is stagnation and bulldozing over others. Marriage: Some marriage challenges flagged, but manageable with awareness. Health: Watch Heart (Fire), Lungs (Metal) — these elements are deficient in your chart. Life lesson: You have abundant energy but it needs direction. Your lesson is channeling power into productive outlets rather than letting it stagnate. Your useful god is Fire (currently at 1.8% — most deficient). Adding Fire brings the chart closest to 20% equilibrium across all five elements. Favorable: Fire, Metal, Wood, Water. Unfavorable: Earth (already excessive). Everything in your life improves when you increase Fire element exposure.
